product_name: Werner Spanker Stand Up Paddle - Full Carbon
long_description: Offering an extremely responsive experience and maximum control, the 19.5 oz., carbon-fiber Werner Spanker Stand Up Paddle dominates waters that might otherwise toss you from your board. Werner Spanker Stand Up Paddle uses an extremely lightweight carbon-fiber shaft to offer a bit of flex to increase comfort on every stroke. Carbon fiber/foam core blade offers a distinctive profile that enters and exits the water quietly while adding buoyancy for a light stroke. Teardrop blade shape with rounded corners reduces torque to smooth out each stroke, and slight spoon shape at the tip of the blade increases power. 12deg angle offers aggressive control from a standing position. Durable, T-shape ABS palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Offering an extremely responsive experience and maximum control, the 19.5 oz., carbon-fiber Werner Spanker Stand Up Paddle dominates waters that might otherwise toss you from your board.
